explains: n. （分数中的）分母；统计基准；命名者；共同特征或共同性质

sentences.en: Tabloid newspapers pander to the lowest common denominator.
sentences.cn: 小报都竭力迎合大众口味。

sentences.en: I think the only common denominator of success is hard work.
sentences.cn: 我认为成功的唯一共同之处就是努力工作。

sentences.en: The school syllabus seems aimed at the lowest common denominator.
sentences.cn: 学校的教学大纲似乎是针对接受能力最差的学生制定的。
